name: bookheaven
description: BookHeaven is an online library and reading management system for storing and organizing eBooks. It provides tagging, categorization, user accounts, and sync support through a self-hosted backend.

features.title: Online Library
features.description: Store and organize eBooks in personal cloud library. Digital bookshelf

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize books with flexible tags. Smart organization

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user support for family or team libraries. Shared reading

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Access your library across all devices. Seamless synchronization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run on your own infrastructure for privacy. Data control

features.title: Book Management
features.description: Add, edit, and organize book metadata. Complete control

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find books quickly with powerful search. Instant access
